modName: UNP Top Model Ancient Nord - Draugr Armor
summary: Both a replacer for the "Ancient Nord Armor" as well as a standalone light version.  Both craftable.  Optional file makes Ancient Nord Armor Craftable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=40]Ancient Nord Armor Replacer and Stand alone[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=35]For UNP Top Model[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=25]TBBP[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=20]Weight Slider Support[/size][/color][/center]


[color=#FF99FF]This file contains two separate downloads. One contains a replacer for the Ancient Nord Armor from vanilla Skyrim (Aela's armor) as well as a stand alone light armor version that can be crafted at the forge under "Leather". The other file is simply an .esp that makes "Ancient Nord Armor Craftable at any forge. It does not require the main file and if you have a mod that already does this you don't need it.[/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]


[color=#FF0000][u][size=50]Requirements![/size][/u][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Top Model Body[/url] by es2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Skeleton[/url] by XP32
(or another TBBP compatible skeleton)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]The TBBP animation of Dragonfly[/url] by Lecid

[center][color=#FF0000][u]Without a TBBP Compatible Skeleton you will Crash to Desktop!!!!![/u][/color][/center]

The optional file only makes Ancient Nord Armor craftable and does not require the main file. It only requires Skyrim and you can use it without any other mod. Check compatibility.

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]


[color=#FF6600][size=15]Recommended [/size][/color]

Mods I use
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7093/?]No Maam Breathing Idles[/url] by Fore
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34508/?]360 Walk and Run Plus[/url] by yukl
[color=#FF6666]Use these for minimal clipping[/color]

Also pick up some other armors I've done for Top Model
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51607/?]Prisoner Clothes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52015/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup[/url]



[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]


[size=30][color=#FFCC66]To Install[/color][/size]
Once you have the correct body and skeleton installed download which ever file you choose or both. One contains the actual armors and the other is just a simple .esp file which will allow you to craft the Ancient Nord Armor. I made it separate because there are other mods out there that do this and I want this to be as compatible as possible. [color=#FF0000][u]So if you can already craft the Vanilla Ancient Nord armor do not install the option file because it may be incompatible![/u][/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]

[size=30][color=#FFCC66]How to Get[/color][/size]
The main file contains a replacer for a cuirass from vanilla Skyrim and with just the main file alone you would get that armor the same way you would before. So you can either loot this somewhere, try to take it from Aela (have fun with that), another mod that lets you craft it, or use the console. If you want to be able to craft this set without all the trouble and arrows in knees then download and install the optional file which lets you craft it at any forge (under steel I think). The standalone armor can be crafted with the main file and is under leather as "Draugr" armor.

If you want any of the textures like in the screenshots then you'll have to find a texture replacer. I personally recommend CaBal's work in aMidianBorn book of silence which is available right here on the nexus, but there are others as well. Otherwise it will have vanilla textures.

[color=#FFFF66]This file contains no extra textures.[/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]


[size=30][color=#FFCC66]Compatibility[/color][/size]
This contains a replacer of the Ancient Nord Armor so any other replacer you have will be overwritten with the main file. This also makes it compatible with vanilla texture replacers (and there are many for this armor set).

The optional file may not be compatible with any other mod that lets you craft Ancient Nord Armor but honestly I'm not 100% sure on that.
[color=#FFFF66]
If you run into any incompatibilities please let me know so I can list them.[/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
